page.title: 05SPORT IN KEYWORTH.
page.content: Although Keyworth isn't a very big place ,there are lots of sports facilities.{Keyworth United F.C.}has teams raging from the Under 11's to the senior team.Their home_grounds are Platt Lane Keyworth,and the Rectory Field Keyworth.{Keyworth Gents Keep {Fit Club}meets Monday's in the "Barn" at South Wolds School{."Otters {Swimming Club}meets Wednesday Saturday and Monday. This club only has junior members. There are also these clubs in Keyworth. {Keyworth Cricket Club, {Keyworth Squash Club, {Keyworth Bowls Club, {Plumtree Cricket Club, {Keyworth and District Tennis Club, {Keyworth Table_Tennis Club} {Keyworth Badminton Club, {Keyworth Aerobics Club,
